name: radioactivity_concentration_of_215Po_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Po" means the element "polonium" and "215Po" is the isotope "polonium-215" with a half-life of 2.06e-08 days.
